name: Doors and Dangers
description:
Submission to the 8th Pirate Software Game Jam

How to play:

Eliminate all enemies in the room to proceed to next room.

One life to get as far as you can.

Controls:

A/D -Move Left / Right

S - Crouch

Space - Jump

Left mouse button - Attack

Exit game - ALT + F4

*Known bugs*

- Some occasions player might fall through the floor

- Some occasions player might not hit the trigger to load the next room and falls into abyss
